name: Connect (s_ali.games)
description:
Connect is a short prototype of a Light novel about a young person who wakes up and realizes that they are unhappy with their current life and the relationships they have. As of late they have ignored their friends and family.  The game plays through 2-3 short conversations where the player character communicates and repairs their friendships.

Shoutout to:

  • Sutemo for male and female sprites
  • NoranekoGames for background images
